psalm.text:
[[Ps 19,2]]The heavens declare the glory of God; 
and the firmament proclaims his handiwork.
[[Ps 19,3]]Day pours out the word to day, 
and night to night imparts knowledge.

[[Ps 19,4]]Not a word nor a discourse 
whose voice is not heard;
[[Ps 19,5]]Through all the earth their voice resounds, 
and to the ends of the world, their message.
psalm.title: Psalms

first_reading.text:
[[Ep 2,19]]Brothers and sisters: You are no longer strangers and sojourners, but you are fellow citizens with the holy ones and members of the household of God,
[[Ep 2,20]]built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, with Christ Jesus himself as the capstone.
[[Ep 2,21]]Through him the whole structure is held together and grows into a temple sacred in the Lord;
[[Ep 2,22]]in him you also are being built together into a dwelling place of God in the Spirit.
first_reading.title: Letter to the Ephesians

gospel.text:
[[Lc 6,12]]Jesus departed to the mountain to pray, and he spent the night in prayer to God.
[[Lc 6,13]]When day came, he called his disciples to himself, and from them he chose Twelve, whom he also named apostles:
[[Lc 6,14]]Simon, whom he named Peter, and his brother Andrew, James, John, Philip, Bartholomew,
[[Lc 6,15]]Matthew, Thomas, James the son of Alphaeus, Simon who was called a Zealot,
[[Lc 6,16]]and Judas the son of James, and Judas Iscariot, who became a traitor.
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke
